title: Kinda Funny Patreon Update Update
description:
We're updating the update because we heard you like updates. Missed the first update? It's here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hgKKyttGyuU

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

Subscribe And Ring The Notification Bell: 
Kinda Funny: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Games: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1
Kinda Funny Plays: http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnyplays?sub_confirmation=1

Get The Shows Ad-Free On Patreon: 
Kinda Funny http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 
Kinda Funny Games http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunnyGames

Buy Some Merch: http://www.kindafunny.com/store 

Follow Us On Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids 

Follow Us On Instagram: http://instagram.com/KindaFunnyVids

Watch Us Live On Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames

Listen To Our Podcasts On Your Favorite Podcast Service:
The Kinda Funny Podcast: https://bit.ly/3wA9GVo
In Review – Movies Ranked, Reviewed, & Recapped: https://bit.ly/2VAgdT7

transcript_chunks.text: what's up everybody Thursday we announced a slew of patreon changes and you hated them well some of you didn't some of you did but everyone had an opinion so we stepped back after saying our piece and spent the weekend listening to you Friday October 14th is going to redefine kind of funny but not our values on January 5th 2015 we told you we weren't building this for you we were building this with you so let's compromise we've introduced the 25 tier that'll get you about 38 Episodes of bonus content a month we firmly believe that these are going to be great products that are far more valuable than your average post show ever was they're worth the price they'll take our time bandwidth and energy but are totally optional however many of you pointed out that even though you now had access to both patreons for ten dollars less than you used to this gated content some of you were already getting at the 10 level like kind of beauty our goal here was to make quality optional content and make

both patreons for ten dollars less than you used to this gated content some of you were already getting at the 10 level like kind of beauty our goal here was to make quality optional content and make it easy for anyone to understand how and why where to get the bonus content we make has that had been a criticism in the past but equally valid is the criticism that for some of you your ten dollars didn't go as far with the new system so let's make it go farther than ever before the 25 tier and its 38 Episodes will remain untouched but we'll add to the 10 tier in addition to the private live stream of every podcast recording across kind of funny and kind of funny games as well as ad-free viewing and listening at the start of each month we'll publish all the bonus content from the month before at the 10 level so in November all the October bonus content will be available for you to view and listen to at the 10 level in December all the November content and so on and so forth etc etc

before at the 10 level so in November all the October bonus content will be available for you to view and listen to at the 10 level in December all the November content and so on and so forth etc etc hopefully you're happy with that but you might be saying that's great for November but it leaves me content light in October so how about this for the month of October we'll publish Gregory my daily five minute Vlog on the ten dollar tier before sending it back to the 25 tier in November so you'll have daily bonus content in October and then a big show dump in November don't like the word dump but I said it sound good I hope so I know this doesn't answer every personal use case you have but it does add value back to the 10 tier that our original plan lost and that seemed to be the one United issue people had so 10 patrons get ready to see me cry because I'm gonna Vlog about Portillo and show number one 25 patrons can you believe that Mike got Cliff blazinski for the first episode of

issue people had so 10 patrons get ready to see me cry because I'm gonna Vlog about Portillo and show number one 25 patrons can you believe that Mike got Cliff blazinski for the first episode of remember blank and everyone else take the day off on October 14th because you don't want to miss what we have in store for you until next time it's been my pleasure to serve you
